mapper.update: update SCREEN set CID = #{cid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MID = #{mid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, VIID = #{viid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STIME = #{stime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SPRICE = #{sprice,jdbcType=OTHER} where SID = #{sid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select SID, CID, MID, VIID, STIME, SPRICE from SCREEN
